item.title: FD Roasted vegetable salad
item.description: 188 caloriesMix together 150g cherry tomatoes 50g sliced courgette 75g sliced aubergine [or twice the amount of courgette] 160g sliced red pepper Scatter with basil leaves and drizzle with balsamic vinegar. Roast in a hot oven [gas mark 7] for 20-25 minutes. Serve with 2 tablespoons parmesan [20g].
